name: SPARKDASH alpha
description:
A speedy platformer prototype! Feedback is appreciated!

The controls are the Arrow keys and Spacebar to jump!

If you run enough and press down you can SPARK JUMP. Just jump again when you´re in the air! You can direct it wherever you want!

Only 3 levels on the demo - Press R to restart the whole game.

The black screen is the end of the thing. It´s a prototype after all!
